spec_data.Name: mplus-1p-fonts
spec_data.Description:
The combination of fixed-fullwidth M+ 1P for Japanese and proportional
M+ 1P Type-1 for alphabets. They are 7 weights from Thin to Black.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 12:05:29 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: M+ P is aimed as sophisticated and relaxed design
